headline: Segway Rolls Out E3 Electric Scooter in Best Buy Canada as Retail Partner Exclusive
summary: Segway, recently named No. 1 in global electric kick-scooter (eKickScooter) sales with more than 13 million sold worldwide, today announces pre-orders are open on the all-new E3 electric scooter through exclusive retail partner, Best Buy Canada. Customers can reserve the latest in the brand's popular entry-level E-Series for only $499.99 CAD ($699.99 MSRP) at BestBuy.ca or more than 90 retail locations across Canada now through the official release date of July 18 when it will be in-stock and fu

thumbnail.caption: The Segway E3 is the most lightweight and portable electric scooter in the brand's third-generation lineup.
